roleset.name: to deceive or get the better of by trickery or flattery
roleset.note: BAMBOOZLE-V NOTES: Based on dictionary.com. Member of VNcls force-59. (from bamboozle.01-v)

example.name: watch out for bamboozlers
example.text: John bamboozled Mary into going to the basketball game with him.
example.arg: into going to the basketball game with him
